eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu

Class CharacterSlotMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.menu.CharacterSlotMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WauzInventory

    public class CharacterSlotMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements WauzInventory
    An inventory that can be used as menu or for other custom interaction mechanics. A character creation menu, that will let the player select their slot.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
    See Also:
    CharacterWorldMenu, CharacterRaceClassMenu

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static void open(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                        WauzMode wauzMode)
        Opens the menu for the given player. Shows three choosable slots for MMO mode or one seasonal slot for Survival mode.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that should view the inventory.
        wauzMode - The wauz mode of the character slots.
        See Also:
        getCharacterSlot(Player, int, boolean), WauzDateUtils.getSurvivalSeasonInteger(), MenuUtils.setBorders(Inventory)

      • getCharacterSlot

        private static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack getCharacterSlot(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                                                               int slotId,
                                                               boolean deletable)
        Generates an item stack, to show infos about a character slot. Most slots will be handled as MMO slots and will show race/class, world and level. Slots with an id over 20000 (survival seasons) will be Survival slots and will show the time left till the current season will end. Empty slots will show "Empty" and deletable slots a delete instruction.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who owns the character.
        slotId - The slot of the character.
        deletable - If the player can clear this slot.
        Returns:
        The character slot item stack.
        See Also:
        PlayerConfigurator.getRaceString(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer, int), PlayerConfigurator.getWorldString(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer, int), PlayerConfigurator.getLevelString(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer, int), PlayerConfigurator.getLastCharacterLogin(org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer, int), WauzDateUtils.getTimeTillNextSeason()

      • selectMenuPoint

        public void selectMenuPoint(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
        Checks if an event in this inventory was triggered by a player click. The default event will be automatically canceled. If the clicked item is a slot selection, it will be cached in the player data. Next the world selection will be shown, for new MMORPG characters. New survival characters will instantly be created. Existing characters will be logged in normally over the character manager. If the slot is deletable, it can be done so, with a right click.
        Specified by:
        selectMenuPoint in interface WauzInventory
        Parameters:
        event - The inventory click event.
        See Also:
        WauzPlayerData.setSelectedCharacterSlot(String), CharacterWorldMenu.open(Player), CharacterManager.createCharacter(Player, WauzMode), CharacterManager.loginCharacter(Player, WauzMode), WauzPlayerEventCharacterDelete
